title: InvalidCastException in MediaComposition.GetThumbnailAsync() on VMs
body: We use MediaComposition to generate thumbnails for mp4 video files. It's working great on physical machines. But on virtual machines we get a InvalidCastException. It's happening on multiple different virtualizers (Parallels, VirtualBox, ...).

comments.body: Did you resolve this? I have exactly the same issue! Thanks.
